item.title: Where to Find My Blogposts
item.description: This blog has been a abandoned for a while because of my engagements with coworking and startups with different organizations. I still publish blog-posts in these blogs: Coworking Handbook: Iâ€™ve been more active in the creation of pages full of resources for coworking spaces.
